text: -I think someone's here. -Who? No one would come here.
From now on, wait on all fours like that.
I might even throw you a bone.
[Hee-joo in distorted voice] What did you say?
What are you trying to do? I really won't stand for this.
But why is it so heavy?
I brought you to Dr. Kim's hospital.
They're being treated in the ER. Thankfully, no one was seriously injured.
The police are analyzing the footage now.
But you need to see something.
[Hyeon-jin] At 10:49 p.m., Hong Hee-joo is safely at home.
[Do-jae] What will you do? The police don't know you're involved.
So? Should I sit back and do nothing?
He broke into my personal office and bombed my team.
But if you get involved now,
Maybe this is what he wants.
A situation where I can't step forward.
There are plenty of ways to screw him over without revealing myself.
set fire to the victim's office last night.
The police, fire department, and forensics are conducting an investigation.
They'll form a dedicated team to look into the incident.
There can't be a Hong Hee-joo I don't know about.
which one is the real one.
Some crazy man delivered a bomb to my personal office.
From now on, I'll be asking the questions.
You said you didn't know who he was, right?
Any guesses on who it is?
[Hee-joo] What do I say if he asks me about the picture?
What does he know about me? And what are you trying to check?
He kidnapped me, and you got hurt because of him.
So, what are we doing right now?
you don't know what I'm trying to do
or what I'm trying to see, right?
I apologize if you were offended.
[sighs] I managed to get away with it.
there have been multiple cases in the area.
The police are investigating this as part of it.
Either he's lucky or he planned this.
He got lucky without knowing about the serial arson,
or he intended to ride the arsonist's coattails.
The explosion happened during the call.
Do you think there's an accomplice?
The fact that he knows so much about me
The police are requesting the threat recording. What shall I do?
What I pieced together earlier was for broadcasting purposes.
Bring your phone. I have to check something.
I need to check for any signs of hacking.
How could you be so careless?
You earn a living with your hands.
Are you going to the center?
I have to leave after I shower.
The candidate registration is coming up.
You've never dropped out of first place in the polls.
Our campaign's PR line for the election is very solid.
Thank you for getting me such talented people.
the most talented one close at hand?
I wonder how you will use him after you keep him hidden away.
This reminds me of when I used to go hunting with Chairman Paik.
I could never match my father's athletic abilities.
He was decisive and made quick judgments.
It seems Sa-eon inherited those qualities. [laughs]
We should tell them not to invite us unless they're golfing.
Am I the only one who's bored?
Would looking at someone else's phone be accidental or intentional?
I'm sorry, but I'll get going.
I'm a bit sensitive to noise.
What do we do about this?
What if this leaves a scar?
I wouldn't have held back if it weren't for you.
OFFICE BUILDING FIRE IN YEOUIDO, SEOUL
DID YOU SEE IT? WHAT DO YOU THINK?
DON'T ACT ALONE FROM NOW ON.
So why did you leave me out?
I want to join in on the fun too.
A college friend? Were you close?
[Sang-woo] Hee-joo, it was great to see you today.
I was reminded of old times, so I looked this up. Remember?
For Crime Report: Season 2, we'll focus on unsolved cases.
Is there anything you haven't revealed yet on your own channel?
Sir, do you really think he'll reveal it on our show?
Instead of asking what it is,
shouldn't you be asking why I haven't revealed it yet?
Yeah, what is it and why haven't you revealed it?
There's an orphanage called Nuri Dream Center.
about 20 years ago, in the town where the orphanage was located,
there was an enormous mansion owned by a wealthy family.
The young master from Seoul came to visit the mansion.
His room was filled with all sorts of toys.
[director] Did he just leave like that?
NURI DREAM CENTER IS AN ORPHANAGE.
[Sang-woo] Let's eat lunch here at noon this Saturday if you have time.
A cup of refreshing tea to soothe an upset stomach.
-I'm on my way. -Have a good day.
The explosive device used is TATP, a high-performance liquid explosive.
Despite its simple manufacturing, it has immense explosive power.
Fortunately, the detonation device wasn't fully activated in this incident.
Aren't the main ingredients acetone and hydrogen peroxide?
That's right, so the police are questioning nearby pharmacies.
What about the voice modulation? Is it not done yet?
It's impossible to analyze with existing software.
We're trying with a different version. I apologize.
I'm asking for so much over personal matters.
You entrusted me with this, and I want to be of help.
Also, if there's someone threatening you, it's my job to figure out who.
[You-ri] Sa-eon, I hope you have a pleasant day today!
I'll show you to your table.
Do you have a private room here?
[You-ri] I see. What do I do?
A table in the open is uncomfortable.
You had plans with the interpreter?
I suddenly got plans to eat here too! [giggles]
please try not to stare too obviously, okay?
He won't act like he knows me, will he?
We checked the explosives, but nothing.
-What about local inquiries? -We're still on it.
But which high-ranking official in the presidential office
Try this. It's in season, so it'll be good.
Hee-joo and Sang-woo are college friends.
It seems like you like seafood.
By the way, Sa-eon, how do you know Hee-joo?
She recently helped us out with interpreting at the British Embassy.
I was hoping to treat you to a meal sometime.
I'm glad we met like this.
Thanks to Hee-joo, I get to have lunch with you, so it's an honor.
We can go if you're uncomfortable.
Mr. Ji? What does he do?
They searched his residence and found plenty of homemade bombs.
If he was watching the fire at the scene,
he's likely a pyromaniac who gets a thrill from it.
So he's most likely the serial arsonist.
Set fire two days in a row?
Why are you blaming me and not catching that guy?
That bastard has no ethics. How dare he do that in my turf?
Does that young brat have nothing better to do?
Okay. I'm on my way now.
Why did you come here? How did you know?
You said you'd check for hacking. Were you spying on me?
Are you hiding something from me?
Whatever it is. Sang-woo isn't that type of person. So--
Do you know him that well?
You said he was a good person.
To me, he's just some loser who suddenly showed up around you.
if you know him so well,
How much do you know about me?
I thought I knew you too.
I knew you all that well after all.
[Jin-e] I need to talk to you. Come to the center.
Excuse me, I have to go now.
[Sa-eon] Can I get your business card?
Come if you ever need counseling or feel any discomfort.
Sorry, but the center called me. I have to go.
♪ Good luck, Hong Hee-joo! You can do it, Hong Hee-joo! ♪
I know you've practiced signing with Paik Sa-eon's videos every day.
Are you nervous about living out your fangirl dreams?
Is your husband having an affair?
I think my husband wishes I were dead.
My goodness. You had me there.
Did he tell you he wishes you were dead?
he still really, really loves you deeply.
When a couple truly separates, they don't engage in heated arguments
or say things like, "I wish you were dead."
They become indifferent and walk back and forth saying,
Call me when there's a corpse.
The man caught earlier was the arsonist.
But there was a small fire in the area that wasn't reported to the police.
You think it was done as a test?
According to the arsonist, those were the only two things he didn't do.
The park and our office building.
If he did that to animals, he could have psychopathic tendencies.
How will you handle the call tonight?
We threw the bait, so let's see how he reacts.
I've reset the equipment in the new office.
I'll start today's broadcast with a cup of tea.
It's a play on words with his name.
That's why his channel is called "Earthly Paradise."
He mainly covers unsolved mystery cases and criminal psychology.
-Excuse me? -Why is he popular among women?
Especially the shoulder deltoids. They're a work of art.
[scoffs] It seems this doctor has a lot of free time.
What should I look for? Do you have specific concerns?
It won't be too much to suspect anyone who comes into view.
Find everything you can on him.
[Jin-e] If you're seriously thinking about getting a divorce,
you have to get this job.
You think it's easy for women to earn a living alone?
Experience as a sign language interpreter at the presidential office
ensures you can get a job anywhere.
[woman on radio] You just listened to the song requested by Song Hyun-joo.
Next, we have a song requested by user 406-000-1290.
Are you okay? I thought you had come out.
Does he know that I have this phone?
Here. There were no traces of hacking.
I asked where you were going.
How does it feel to have messed up so badly, 406?
So why did you drag your feet?
It's your fault for taking my threat lightly.
I want to ask you something first.
What do you gain if I leave Hong Hee-joo?
What are you trying to achieve by getting me to divorce Hong Hee-joo?
It's not like you married her for love.
You don't even love her now.
If it's going to be like that, just leave her.
[Sa-eon] I guess you have no idea how that sounds to me.
your threats are for someone else's benefit.
What's your relationship with Hong Hee-joo?
I will never give you what you want.
You're a crazy man resorting to kidnapping, extortion,
Do you think I'd give Hee-joo to you?
-Wait, why won't you give her up-- -I'm sorry.
Let's end the call here for today.
I'm saying this just in case someone misleads you.
Whether it's a scandal or rumor,
I won't tolerate my name being dragged through the mud.
Did the official document reach the center?
You're going to have to give it your all to stand beside me.
Why do you want me by your side?
If I become the interpreter at the presidential office,
The entire world will know my name and face.
You seem pretty confident, don't you?
I can assure you, there's no one better than me.
What unfounded confidence is that? You're not that experienced.
Experience isn't everything. I can tell by a person's expression.
I know what you're going to say and what you're thinking.
The guy who kidnapped you and threw a bomb in my office knows a lot,
It's true we may be better off as strangers,
I don't like that what he said is true.
What? Are you afraid I'll jump you?
If I were going to, I'd have done it already.
Are you scared you might jump me?
Yeah, I could see that happening.
Don't come if you can't resist.
It's rude to the person beside you.
He knew where my office was…
so the house probably isn't safe either.
And whatever happened the day you were kidnapped…
just think of it as a bad dream.
[Hee-joo] That you said to call when there's a corpse?
Don't read too much into it.
[screaming] Why are you unscathed? You should've been hurt too!
Be quiet. Don't make a sound.
His biological daughter's deaf, and his only son is dead.
and if you upset the chairman, we'll get kicked out!
Not every life holds the same value, Hee-joo.
We can only stay if the chairman feels sorry for us.
How long do I have to not speak?
You know, the guy who got a naked picture of his wife from some crazy man.
He'd know if he checked his wife.
Normal people would've lost it and dug right in for the truth.
But he can't even check for himself.
He's got to be a pervert.
[nurse] The weather's cooled down, so it's bearable now.
I didn't bring a blanket. I'll be right back, okay?
[man] Let's have a moment of silence
to honor our patriotic martyrs and fallen heroes.
Bow for a moment of silence.
Starting now, I'll ask you questions,
means you're threatening Paik Sa-eon, right?
If not, I'm coming for that phone…
I swear, Paik Sa-eon is a total asshole.
I like you. Do you know why?
Because you have the same goal as us.
She's his daughter. Na Jin-cheol's… What?
I'm so sorry. I stepped away for just a moment.
When the caregiver found your father, he was alone.
But since your father is unharmed, they could belong to someone else.
For now, we need to investigate it.
Yes, will you come with us to file a report?
-[officer 1] What's wrong with this? -[officer 2] What's wrong with this thing?
[officer 1] What's going on with that now? What's happening?
[Yeon-hui] Why do I still have to bring things like this
No one in this world is on my side.
What? Why are they coming towards us?
Hello. Thank you for your hard work.
I'll come to the station to file the report.
I'm sorry, but what's your relationship with her?
[Sa-eon] It's your chance to try with your name on the line.
how you're going to handle the aftermath if I get the job.
[Sa-eon] Finally, I want to test you on something.
Can you not speak at all?
